name: Death & Time don't matter
description:
« Time & death don't matter » is a 3D game where you play an active ragdoll. Stuck inside a time loop, but also a literal loop, you must go back in time a die many times to solve puzzles and collect keys in order to escape this never ending circle. Have fun !

Control : WASD + Space (or left button)

Or ZQSD + Space (French keyboard friendly)

Made by : Amaury Guillet & Francois de Crouy-Chanel

Music by Rudy (Instagram : gavroche_dydy )
